## LPStake class

Represents a user's LP stake and accrued gains.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class LPStake 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `LPStake` class.
